summary: This adds a beautiful Playerhome for the player click on this mod to check it out.
descriptionHtml:
Hi welcome to Sovngarde Player Home Please look at pictures to see your self what it looks like

requires: [Dawnguard DragonBorn Hearthfire] 

You Get You Own Room You will find that from were you enter turn left to that room at the end there will be a door that is your room
In your room you will have everything you need in there

Wait wont that ruin the Sovngarde mission ?  (): no the player home is in a new area brand new place

How do i get there ?  (): Look in picture there is a map view picture there is a map marker you can travel to

Feel Free to upload you photos ;) 

So ye enjoy [▼Videos Below▼]


                                    [youtube]yXracVOsGJU[/youtube]
author: Shadow0987
